units.title: Lentiviral vector construction
units.text: we engineered a lentiviral vector to deliver 4-hydroxytamoxifen-inducible CRE recombinase and a dual single-guide RNA (sgRNA) cassette (Fig. 1a).
units.rationale: Describes how the delivery vector for inducible editing was built.

units.title: Dual sgRNA design
units.text: The dual sgRNA consists of two sgRNAs targeting the same gene, expressed under the U6 or H1 promoter. The dual gRNA is located within the 3′ LTR.
units.rationale: Specifies the configuration of the sgRNA cassette used for gene targeting.

units.title: gRNA reporter assay
units.text: Successful genome editing causes frameshift mutations, resulting in the loss of blue fluorescent protein (BFP) fluorescence, which enables the quantitative evaluation of gRNA efficiency (Fig. 1c and Extended Data Fig. 1b,c).
units.rationale: Provides a functional readout to assess editing efficiency.

units.title: Lentiviral plasmid library preparation
units.text: We individually cloned sgRNA pairs and pooled them equally to construct a lentiviral plasmid library (Extended Data Fig. 3a,b). To ensure that lentiviral integration frequency was limited to one per cell, we used a low infection rate of 2.5% (ref. 18) (Extended Data Fig. 3c–e).
units.rationale: Outlines cloning and infection conditions to achieve single-copy integration.

units.title: Clone barcode introduction
units.text: we introduced a unique clone barcode (UCB; 1.4 × 10^7 combinations) for each dual sgRNA cassette to label individual lentiviral integration events (Fig. 1a and Extended Data Fig. 4a,b).
units.rationale: Enables tracking of each perturbation in the pooled screen.

units.title: eCas9 induction and neural induction
units.text: eCas9 was induced in 5‑day‑old embryoid bodies, followed by neural induction.
units.rationale: Defines the timing of Cas9 activation and subsequent differentiation step.

units.title: FACS analysis of mutant cell proportion
units.text: Fluorescence‑activated cell sorting (FACS)‑based analyses we found a mean average cell number per clone of 4.4 (Extended Data Fig. 4e,f). These data suggest that mutant cells (GFP+/dTomato+) remained at low percent‑ages throughout development.
units.rationale: Quantifies clonal representation and mutant cell frequency.

units.title: Bulk DNA extraction for clonal representation
units.text: Using this strategy, we obtained an average of 2,770 bulk‑extracted genomic DNA from organoid pools of four different embryoid bodies (Fig. 1e).
units.rationale: Describes DNA collection for downstream clonal analysis.

units.title: Cell‑cluster annotation
units.text: We first annotated cell clusters based on control cells (non‑targeting gRNA control) and eCas9‑uninduced cells (35,203 cells) (Extended Data Fig. 6d–f).
units.rationale: Establishes reference clusters for comparative analysis.

units.title: FACS validation of gene‑specific phenotypes
units.text: Using a FACS‑based approach, we further confirmed the enrichment and depletion phenotypes in individually perturbed organoids for the four genes (KMT2C, LEO1, ADNP and WAC).
units.rationale: Validates screen hits with targeted phenotypic assessment.
